hero.headline: Hi, I'm Alex, a UX Designer
hero.subtext: I craft intuitive and engaging digital experiences that solve real-world problems. With a background in psychology and a passion for design, I bring a user-centered approach to every project.

featuredProjects.title: E-commerce Platform Redesign
featuredProjects.desc: A complete overhaul of an online store, focusing on usability and conversion rates.

featuredProjects.title: Mobile Banking App
featuredProjects.desc: A mobile banking application designed for ease of use and accessibility.

featuredProjects.title: User Research Study
featuredProjects.desc: A comprehensive study on user behavior and needs in the healthcare industry.

githubPortfolio.title: Project Alpha
githubPortfolio.desc: A web application for managing tasks.

githubPortfolio.title: Project Beta
githubPortfolio.desc: A mobile app for tracking fitness activities.

githubPortfolio.title: Project Epsilon
githubPortfolio.desc: An app for personal finance management.

experience.title: UX Designer at Tech Innovators Inc. (2018-Present)
experience.desc: Led design for major product launches, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement. Key projects included a redesign of the flagship product's user interface and the development of a new mobile application.

experience.title: Interaction Designer at Digital Solutions Co. (2013-2018)
experience.desc: Developed user interfaces for web and mobile applications, focusing on usability and accessibility. Notable projects included designing the user experience for a popular e-commerce platform and a suite of productivity tools.

experience.title: Junior Designer at Creative Minds Agency (2008-2013)
experience.desc: Created visual designs and prototypes for various client projects, gaining experience in user-centered design. Worked on projects ranging from marketing websites to internal tools, contributing to the design process from concept to execution.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert

aboutMe.desc: I'm a UX designer with over 5 years of experience in creating user-friendly and visually appealing digital products. My expertise lies in user research, interaction design, and prototyping. I'm passionate about understanding user needs and translating them into effective design solutions. I've worked with a variety of clients, from startups to large corporations, and I'm always eager to take on new challenges.
aboutMe.quote: Great architecture isn’t just scalable. It’s thoughtful, ethical, and built for the people who use it. – Alex Carter
